entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023
